alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 01 at 4:06AM PST until March 01 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Northwestern Nye County and Northeastern Nye County. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County
